title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Mathematical Simulation Based on Reusable Learning Objects (RLOs)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can calculate the volume and surface area of geometric shapes in three-dimensional space using RLO-based modules
Learners can analyze the correlation between function graphs and real-world data in a simulation environment to generate mathematical models
Learners can design personalized math tutorials by recombining RLOs and explaining them to peers through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
